climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Ergonomic Design: Our Wedge Car Seat Cushion combines ergonomic design and memory foam technology to provide exceptional comfort and support. The wedge shape helps improve posture and relieve pressure on the waist, legs, and buttocks. Whether you're on a long drive or working in your chair, our lumbar support cushion provides the perfect solution for extended periods of sitting.

Two-in-One Functionality: Say goodbye to discomfort and pain caused by inadequate support between the buttocks and seat, as well as the back and seat during driving. Our innovative design functions as both a driver seat cushion and lumbar support, providing extra comfort and improved posture. Experience a more enjoyable and pain-free driving experience with our versatile cushion.

Improved Visibility and Pain Relief: Not only does our seat cushion raise your position for improved sight and safer driving, but lumbar support pillow for car also provides spinal protection and pain relief. By reducing pressure on the coccyx and sacrum, car seat cushions for driving help alleviate lower back pain and sciatica, promoting a more comfortable and pain-free driving experience. Enhance your driving comfort with our lumbar support cushion.

Posture Correction and Stress Relief: Our car seat cushion also acts as a lumbar support, helping you maintain proper posture and relieve pressure. Whether you're at work or on the road, our car seat cushion is designed to reduce back pain and maintain the natural curve of the spine. Say goodbye to discomfort and say hello to stress-free driving or work.

All-Season Comfort and Breathability: Our auto seat cushion features a breathable 4D mesh design for optimum air circulation, ensuring cool and dry comfort in any season. The detachable cover allows easy cleaning and extends the life of the car cushions for driving. In addition, its compact and portable design makes the back support pillow suitable for all types of car seats, office chairs, wheelchairs, and even airplane seats. Experience the ultimate comfort wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Memory Foam Cushion with my office chair for my back. I tried it as the cushion underneath me at first, and it worked very well for that, but then I switched it to my lumbar cushion. It has been very comfortable, and is providing nice, additional support to the standard chair that I currently have set up as my desk chair. So far, the memory foam has stayed in its original form, and I would say it has a moderate firmness to it, but it never gets so firm that it makes my back hurt from prolonged usage. The material is washable (not the memory foam itself, but that is expected), and it seems to be tough and durable with good stitching to hold up to the pressures of being repeatedly sat upon, as well as shifting yourself on the chair. It is a great option for extra back or rear support while seated. I can’t find a thing wrong with it, and the price is fair as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these for both of our cars after I received this one. I can not explain how nice it is now to have your legs and booty fried on the hot car seat. Also, the relief my lower back got because I was sitting up correctly was immense. I've had mine for a while now and there are no signs of wear, the padding is still just as plush as when I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car/seat lumbar cushion
reviews.reviewText: This cushion puts the “cush” in cushion! It’s very cushy, comfy and feels great any way I use it. Whether I sit at my desk chair with this cushion under my bum or driving in my car with the cushion behind my low back, it creates comfort and feels great. It reminds me of a thick pillow version of a gel insole for my shoes. You’ve just got to try it and see for yourself. I highly recommend this cushion! It also has a non-slip backing so it stays in place pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs straps to hold it on.
reviews.reviewText: I got this to help my husband's back while driving his truck. He does like it and says it helps. Very comfortable. But it kept falling out every time he got out of the truck. And the cover gets pushed down and wadded up when using. I sewed adjustable straps to the back of the cover. These go around the seat and hold the cushion in place. Now it works perfectly. Good cushion but needs some way to keep it in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We'll be using this cushion on a desk chair. The no skid bottom and comfortable top make it perfect for a desk seat. Unlike other items we've seen on Amazon, this cushion seems larger than it appeared in its description. In our case larger is better.I had originally ordered the cushion to be used on my recumbent trike, but it turned out to be too big for the trike. Now it's perfect for my wife's desk chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband is a driver by profession so I got this hoping he could use it but knowing if he couldn't- it would wind up in my kid's gaming chair.He's happy with it. The size and shape makes it easy to position for support where you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this cushion for my daughter as she works from home and her chair is not that comfortable. She loves it she said it works great. You can use it in a vehicle as well which is nice especially for long drives.
J’ai acheter de produit pour mon conjoint camionneur et il approuve son confort soutien bien je recommande
